name: Star-Slider
description:
Rikku lost his rocket on a distant red planet.
Now he must find and gather the rocket pieces on each level so he could take off back to space.

This is a take off on "Rush Hour" which the player must move blocks to advance the path of the hero on the maze to lead to his rocket piece.

Doing so is by clicking with the Action button (Default is Z on keyboard )  on a block and then drag it and move it by clicking on the arrow with the action button once again. 

By pressing on Rikku, you must advance and drag his sqaure to the rocket (usually placed on the button of the screen) to win the level.

The stage has hazards that can damage Rikku as well as there is a count down timer which the level must be completed within the given time frame.

==============

Full game contains 25 Puzzles with many different obstacles such as teleporting blocks, fire pistons, spark pistons and bombs.

Demo contains different 7 Puzzles with various obstacles.
